content.text:
# Pemberton (ward)

| footnotes              =
| website                 =
}}
Pemberton is an electoral ward in Wigan, England. It forms part of Wigan Metropolitan Borough Council, as well as the parliamentary constituency of Wigan.
Councillors
The ward is represented by three councillors: Jeanette Prescott (Lab), Paul Prescott (Lab), and Eileen Rigby.
